title: Welcome
text:
##Needles & Bolts Popup Shop
Below is a list of products we’re offering today at Needles & Bolts!
Please do not pay for an item until you have physically selected it. The person checking you out will need to confirm the sale before any payment is accepted.

How to Pay: Click the “Pay Now” button, enter the exact price listed below (including tax), and complete your card payment on the secure Stripe page.


Welcome! My name is Andrew Murray and I craft unique and custom pieces out of locally and sustainably sourced wood. Whether you’re looking for a one-of-a-kind furniture piece, a handcrafted cutting board, or a personalized gift, I’m here to bring your vision to life. Browse through my Gallery to see some of my previous work, or visit the Shop to explore available items. If you have a specific project in mind or would like to discuss custom orders, please don’t hesitate to Contact me. I look forward to working with you!
